item.title: Portfolio
item.description: First of all, you can see me programming a FizzBuzz using TDD (hope you don’t mind the soundtrack): Didn’t even leave the keyboard! Current projects Freelance Smart Home automation using Amazon Alexa/AWS Lambda, Google Home, Raspberry Pi, Python/Django, Android. Web-development. Example: Tem Cena Depois? List of movies that have scenes after the credits roll (so you don’t miss it or don’t waste time waiting for nothing).
